title: Paws'N'Tails
author: Luna
pages: Today was packed with laughter as Mittens, Rufus, and I kicked off a race through our favorite meadow.
Mittens was all grace and speed, leaping deftly over the grass. Rufus, on the other hand, bounded clumsily beside us, but his enthusiasm was contagious.
A clear winner didn't emerge, but that was never the point. Laying in the sun afterwards, we all felt like champions, basking in the warmth of a good day.
